PublicationDelivery.Description: Example of simple car pooling ride offfer and fare

CompositeFrame.Name: Ride Sharing Example
CompositeFrame.Description: This is an example showing how one might encode static aspects of a car ride sharing scheme "ryde" in NeTEx. It includes some prices.
